source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW documents_grouped

    AS

SELECT id,
case_reference,
document_type,
previous_type,
blob_url,
filename,
document_version,
type_code,
description,
key_points,
date_modified,
expected_from


FROM odw_standardised_db.checkmark_documents
WHERE id IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY id,case_reference,
document_type,
previous_type,
blob_url,
filename,
document_version,
type_code,
description,
key_points,
date_modified,
expected_from

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (checkmark) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.comment_fact)
- **New Data:** where a TypeId in the source does not exist as an id in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on TypeId in source and id in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an id in the target exists but the same TypeId doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View comment_type_reference_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build comment_state_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW documents_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id IS NULL
        THEN T3.DocumentsReferenceID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS DocumentsReferenceID, -- surrogate key
    T1.id                           AS DocumentsID,
    T1.case_reference               AS CaseReference,
    T1.document_type                AS DocumentType,
    T1.previous_type                AS PreviousType,
    T1.blob_url                     AS BlobURL,
    T1.filename                     AS Filename,
    T1.document_version             AS DocumentVersion,
    T1.type_code                    AS TypeCode,
    T1.description                  AS Description,
    T1.key_points                   AS KeyPoints,
    T1.date_modified                AS DateModified,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat( 
            IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.document_type,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.blob_url,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.filename,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.document_version,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.description,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.key_points,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM documents_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Checkmark" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_documents_dim T3 
    ON T1.id = T3.DocumentsID 
        AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T1.ID = T3.DocumentsID AND md5(
                concat( 
                    IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.document_type,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.blob_url,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.filename,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.document_version,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.description,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.key_points,'.')
                )) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.DocumentsID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.id IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM documents_grouped)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **table_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View table_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW documents_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    DocumentsReferenceID,
    DocumentsID,
    CaseReference,
    DocumentType,
    PreviousType,
    BlobURL,
    Filename,
    DocumentVersion,
    TypeCode,
    Description,
    KeyPoints,
    DateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From documents_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    DocumentsReferenceID,
    DocumentsID,
    CaseReference,
    DocumentType,
    PreviousType,
    BlobURL,
    Filename,
    DocumentVersion,
    TypeCode,
    Description,
    KeyPoints,
    DateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_documents_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM documents_dim_new WHERE DocumentsID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate                               AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1))     AS ClosingDate,
    'Y'                                         AS IsActive

FROM documents_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW documents_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    DocumentsReferenceID,
    DocumentsID,
    CaseReference,
    DocumentType,
    PreviousType,
    BlobURL,
    Filename,
    DocumentVersion,
    TypeCode,
    Description,
    KeyPoints,
    DateModified,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM documents_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View table_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. table from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.table_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_documents_dim AS Target
USING documents_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.DocumentsReferenceID = Target.DocumentsReferenceID

-- For Updates existing rows
WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (DocumentsReferenceID,
        DocumentsID,
        CaseReference,
        DocumentType,
        PreviousType,
        BlobURL,
        Filename,
        DocumentVersion,
        TypeCode,
        Description,
        KeyPoints,
        DateModified,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.DocumentsReferenceID,
        Source.DocumentsID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.DocumentType,
        Source.PreviousType,
        Source.BlobURL,
        Source.Filename,
        Source.DocumentVersion,
        Source.TypeCode,
        Source.Description,
        Source.KeyPoints,
        Source.DateModified,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) 
;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.table_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new tableID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_documents_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DocumentsReferenceID NULLS LAST) AS DocumentsReferenceID, 
    DocumentsID,
    CaseReference,
    DocumentType,
    PreviousType,
    BlobURL,
    Filename,
    DocumentVersion,
    TypeCode,
    Description,
    KeyPoints,
    DateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_documents_dim;
